titleStmt.title: A declaration of suche true articles as George Ioye hath gone about to confute as false
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, Stephen, 1483?-1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Aldersgate strete by Iohannes Herforde, at the costes and charges of Robert Toye, dwellyng in Paules church yarde at the sygne of the Bell],

notesStmt.note: Foreword signed: Steuen Bysshop of wynchester, i.e. Stephen Gardiner.
A reply to: Joye, George. George Joye confuteth, Winchesters false articles.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules church yarde at the sygne of the Bell]
